full_summary:
Title: {opening sentence for title}.
=========================

### Project Overview

The Government of Canada is undertaking a competitive bidding process for the acquisition of elevator cylinder replacement services for the Pacific Forestry Centre (PFC) in British Columbia, Canada.

### Description of the Assignment

Services under this contract require the replacement of elevator cylinders at the PFC.

### Contract Information

#### Contract Number

* WS4287326251

#### Solicitation Number

* WS4287326251

#### Tender Closing Date

* November 24, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Mountain Standard Time)

#### Expected Contract Start and End Dates

* Expected contract start date: November 27, 2023
* Expected contract end date: May 27, 2024

#### Category and Type of Contract

* Category: CNST (Request for Proposal)
* Method of procurement: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Location of Deliverables

* Canada
* British Columbia

### Contact Information

* Name: Donna Fung (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17891035?extsite=MTc4OTEwMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

=========================
